info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 12 at 11:06AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Newport/Morehead City NC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Carolina...
Trent River At Pollocksville affecting Jones County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring.
* WHERE...Trent River at Pollocksville.
* WHEN...From this morning until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 4.0 feet, Water floods property and some out buildings on Hughes Plantation Road. Water also inundates the Pollocksville boat launch area.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 4.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:15 AM EDT Sunday was 4.4 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps.
The next statement will be issued late tonight at 215 AM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
